SummaryEnglish: Yeo Euijoon, who works at a convenience store under frequent threats from gangsters, spends his days in fear, but even so he cannot afford to quit his job, after all, the salary is much higher than in other stores. One day, Euijoon, in danger, is saved by the sudden appearance of Beom Gunwoo. Buying the same things every day, the cashier becomes curious about his savior-customer and... Wait, he lives in the apartment next door?!

1.SummaryEnglish: It's a convenience store where only gangsters come and go, but today, a customer is kicking another customer. And it's right in front of Yi-jun's nose while he's working part-time. What's going on here...!

2.SummaryEnglish: On the first day of school, Yi-jun, who couldn't sleep because he kept thinking about Gun-woo the night before, goes to school exhausted. Then, he meets Hyun-woo, his crush, and thinks about Hyun-woo's secret that he heard from his friend. Yi-jun keeps thinking that maybe his love could be possible too. He tells Hyun-woo his feelings...
